life.client.DeckItems

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.client.DeckItems.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    Represents a playing card for card games.
    Author:
    Alex Life

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card()
      Creates a blank card, for use with create method.
      Card(java.lang.String face, java.lang.String value)
      Creates a card which will either mimic a playing card

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String face,
            java.lang.String value)
        Creates a card which will either mimic a playing card
        Parameters:
        face - Ex: Diamonds, Hearts, Spades, Red, Blue, Green, Draw4
        value - numerical identifier of a playing card, can also be left blank for special cards with no values Ex: Uno draw 4 card..

      • Card

        public Card()
        Creates a blank card, for use with create method.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public Card create(java.lang.String data)
        Creates a card from a string ex 'Ace of clubs', '2 of diamonds'
        Parameters:
        data - card string
        Returns:
        new Card instance

      • getHidden

        public boolean getHidden()
        Check to see if card is hidden from view.
        Returns:
        boolean hidden

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of a playing card. This method should be overridden by anything other than a normal deck of poker cards.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Card c)
        Compares the equivalence of two cards according to value/rank and suit/color of the card.
        Parameters:
        c - Card to be compared
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether the value is the same in both cards

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object o)
        Compares two cards based on value/rank of the card for ordering cards.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable
        Parameters:
        o - Card object to be compared
        Returns:
        Returns -1 if the calling instance value is lower, 0 if the values are equal, 1 if the calling instance is larger

      • flipCard

        public void flipCard()
        Changes the card so that it can be viewed by other players or hidden depending. Default hidden value is false. **** Hidden does no actual 'hiding' of a card this must be done by the client. ****
